DOC.brief_summary: One year prospective analysis of drug utilization and prescription point prevalence of medications in a pediatric tertiary care university medical center. Off-label use of medications in the study population will be also registered.
DOC.brief_title: Drug Utilization Prevalence in a Pediatric Care Medical Center
DOC.criteria: All admitted children receiving at least one prescribed or OTC medication. All admitted children who do not get a prescribed or OTC medication.
